verses.name: Colossians 3:1
verses.text: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

verses.name: Colossians 3:2
verses.text: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

verses.name: Colossians 3:3
verses.text: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

verses.name: Colossians 3:4
verses.text: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

verses.name: Colossians 3:5
verses.text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:

verses.name: Colossians 3:6
verses.text: For which things’ sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:

verses.name: Colossians 3:7
verses.text: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.

verses.name: Colossians 3:8
verses.text: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.

verses.name: Colossians 3:9
verses.text: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;

verses.name: Colossians 3:10
verses.text: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:

verses.name: Colossians 3:11
verses.text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.

verses.name: Colossians 3:12
verses.text: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;

verses.name: Colossians 3:13
verses.text: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

verses.name: Colossians 3:14
verses.text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

verses.name: Colossians 3:15
verses.text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.

verses.name: Colossians 3:16
verses.text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

verses.name: Colossians 3:17
verses.text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.

verses.name: Colossians 3:18
verses.text: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.

verses.name: Colossians 3:19
verses.text: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.

verses.name: Colossians 3:20
verses.text: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.

verses.name: Colossians 3:21
verses.text: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.

verses.name: Colossians 3:22
verses.text: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:

verses.name: Colossians 3:23
verses.text: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;

verses.name: Colossians 3:24
verses.text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.

verses.name: Colossians 3:25
verses.text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
